channel.title: Archaeoastronomy on open-archaeo
channel.description: Recent content in Archaeoastronomy on open-archaeo

item.title: ArchaeoLines
item.description: The ArchaeoLines plugin displays any combination of declination arcs most relevant to archaeo- or ethnoastronomical studies.

item.title: skyscapeR
item.description: An R package for data reduction, visualization and analysis in skyscape archaeology, archaeoastronomy and cultural astronomy.
